Question.Subject: On Twitter, can they read your tweets?
Question.Content: Can the people that you are following, but are not following you, read your tweets? Mine are not public.
Question.ChosenAnswer: If your Twitter account is set to Private, only those who you allow to follow you will see your tweets. For example, I have a public account and you start following me but I don't follow you back and you have a private account. You are able to see my tweets but I'm not able to see yours unless I start following you and you accept me. Hope I didn't confuse you. lol

Answer.Content: If your Twitter account is set to Private, only those who you allow to follow you will see your tweets. For example, I have a public account and you start following me but I don't follow you back and you have a private account. You are able to see my tweets but I'm not able to see yours unless I start following you and you accept me. Hope I didn't confuse you. lol
